slides.title: Unlocking AI's Potential
content: Artificial Intelligence is a powerful tool.
Its effectiveness depends on how we communicate.
Analogy: A super-smart assistant.
Clear instructions yield better results.
narration: Welcome to the world of prompting!
Artificial Intelligence is rapidly growing in our daily lives.
It's a powerful tool, from chatbots to image generators.
However, its effectiveness depends on how we communicate.
Think of it like having a super-smart assistant.
slides.image_prompt: An illustration of a person giving instructions to a friendly, intelligent robot assistant. The assistant is holding a glowing thought bubble, ready to execute tasks. Focus on clear communication.

slides.title: Clarity: Say What You Mean
content: AI cannot read your mind; precision is key.
Ambiguity leads to generic or incorrect responses.
Weak: 'Write about dogs.'
Good: 'Write a short paragraph about owning a dog.'
Advanced: 'Write a concise, engaging paragraph for a pet blog on psychological benefits of dog ownership, highlighting companionship for busy professionals.'
narration: Let's explore the anatomy of a great prompt.
First, clarity: Say exactly what you mean.
The AI cannot read your mind; precision is key.
Ambiguity leads to generic or irrelevant responses.
For example, a weak prompt: 'Write about dogs.'
A good prompt: 'Write a short paragraph about owning a dog.'
An advanced prompt goes further.
It specifies the audience, format, and key themes.
For instance, it might highlight psychological benefits for professionals.
slides.image_prompt: A visual comparing three speech bubbles. The first is vague (a question mark), the second is slightly clearer (a simple dog icon), the third is detailed (a dog icon with a thought bubble of 'psychological benefits, busy professionals'). Emphasize precision.

slides.title: Specificity: Details Matter
content: Provide enough information for AI to understand.
Avoid vagueness in your requests.
Weak: 'Tell me a story.'
Good: 'Tell me a short sci-fi story about a robot.'
Advanced: 'Write a 500-word sci-fi story set on Mars, featuring a robot named Unit 734 discovering an alien artifact. Focus on discovery and friendship with a hopeful ending.'
Pro Tip: Use the 5 W's and H (Who, What, When, Where, Why, How).
narration: Next, let's talk about specificity.
Provide enough information for the AI to understand.
Always avoid vagueness in your requests.
A weak prompt: 'Tell me a story.'
A good prompt: 'Tell me a short sci-fi story about a robot.'
An advanced prompt specifies length, setting, character, and themes.
Pro Tip: Use the 5 W's and H: Who, What, When, Where, Why, How.
slides.image_prompt: An illustration of a magnifying glass focusing on a small detail within a larger image. Next to it, icons representing the 5 W's and H (Who, What, When, Where, Why, How). Highlight the importance of granular details.

slides.title: Context and Constraints
content: Context: Give the AI a role or persona.
Weak: 'Explain photosynthesis.'
Advanced: 'Act as a high school biology teacher. Explain photosynthesis to 10th graders using a cooking analogy, covering main inputs and outputs.'
Constraints: Tell the AI how to present information.
Weak: 'Give me ideas for a birthday party.'

Advanced: 'Generate 5 unique, budget-friendly ideas for a 30th birthday party for a board game and craft beer lover. Present each with a 2-3 sentence description and 2-3 bullet points for activities, decor, and food pairings.'
narration: Elevating prompts involves context and constraints.
Context is king: Give the AI a role or persona.
A weak prompt: 'Explain photosynthesis.' (You get a generic entry.)
An advanced prompt provides a teacher's persona and analogy.
Constraints shape the output's format and style.
A weak prompt: 'Give me ideas for a birthday party.'
An advanced prompt specifies number, interests, and format.
slides.image_prompt: A visual metaphor: a director (person) on a film set, clearly instructing an actor (robot) on their role (persona) and scene boundaries (constraints). The actor is performing exactly as directed.

slides.title: Summary: Key Takeaways
content: Clarity & Specificity: Be precise and detailed.
Context & Constraints: Give AI a role and define output.
Iterate & Refine: Experiment and adjust prompts.
The AI is a tool: You are the director.
narration: Let's quickly summarize our key takeaways.
Remember clarity and specificity: Be precise in your requests.
Use context and constraints: Give the AI a role.
Also, define how you want the output formatted.
Iterate and refine: Don't expect perfection initially.
slides.image_prompt: A vibrant infographic summarizing the four key takeaways: clarity, specificity, context/constraints, and iteration. Each point has a small, relevant icon. A central image of a brain or lightbulb connecting these ideas.

slides.title: Assignment: Your Turn to Prompt!
content: Scenario: Plan a simple, healthy dinner for two people for a weeknight.
Initial Weak Prompt: 'Give me a dinner recipe.'
Activity: Transform this weak prompt into a 'Good,' then 'Better,' and finally an 'Advanced' prompt.
Consider: Who is eating? What kind of meal? Dietary needs? Output format?
narration: Now for a practical application: your turn to prompt!
Scenario: You need a simple, healthy dinner for two.
Your initial weak prompt is: 'Give me a dinner recipe.'
Your activity is to transform this prompt.
Make it 'Good,' then 'Better,' and finally 'Advanced.'
